description.en: Update an existing event in your Google Calendar. Modify the title, description, time, location, or attendees.
description.de: Aktualisiere einen bestehenden Eintrag in deinem Google Kalender. Ã„ndere Titel, Beschreibung, Zeit, Ort oder Teilnehmer.

vars.ACCESS_TOKEN: env:GOOGLE_CALENDAR_ACCESS_TOKEN|OAuth 2.0 access token from Google. Get it from Google Cloud Console after OAuth authentication.

inputs.name: Calendar ID
inputs.description: The calendar ID containing the event. Use 'primary' for your primary calendar.
inputs.bot: The calendar ID. Use 'primary' for the user's primary calendar, or the calendar email address for other calendars.

inputs.name: Event ID
inputs.description: The ID of the event to update.
inputs.bot: The event ID from Google Calendar. You can get this from the event's details or from listing events.

inputs.name: Event Title
inputs.description: The updated title or name of the event.
inputs.bot: The event title or summary, e.g., 'Team Meeting', 'Project Review', 'Lunch with Client'.

inputs.name: Description
inputs.description: Updated detailed description of the event.
inputs.bot: A detailed description of the event. Can include notes, agenda items, or other relevant information.

inputs.name: Start Date Time
inputs.description: Updated start date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2024-01-15T10:00:00') or RFC3339 format.
inputs.bot: The start date and time in ISO 8601 format like '2024-01-15T10:00:00' or RFC3339 format. Include timezone if needed.

inputs.name: End Date Time
inputs.description: Updated end date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2024-01-15T11:00:00') or RFC3339 format.
inputs.bot: The end date and time in ISO 8601 format like '2024-01-15T11:00:00' or RFC3339 format. Include timezone if needed.

inputs.name: Start Time Zone
inputs.description: Time zone for the start time (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/Berlin', 'Asia/Tokyo'). Optional if datetime includes timezone.
inputs.bot: The time zone for the start time, e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/Berlin', 'UTC'. Optional if the datetime string includes timezone information.

inputs.name: End Time Zone
inputs.description: Time zone for the end time (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/Berlin', 'Asia/Tokyo'). Optional if datetime includes timezone.
inputs.bot: The time zone for the end time, e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/Berlin', 'UTC'. Optional if the datetime string includes timezone information.

inputs.name: Location
inputs.description: Updated location of the event (e.g., '123 Main St, City, Country' or 'Conference Room A').
inputs.bot: The event location. Can be a physical address, room name, or video conference link.

inputs.name: Attendees
inputs.description: JSON array of attendee objects. Example: [{"email": "user@example.com"}, {"email": "other@example.com"}]
inputs.bot: JSON array of attendee objects. Each object should have an 'email' field. Example: [{"email": "user@example.com"}]
